attributes.action: use his influence to help reinstate the Blackwall Tunnel contraflow during the morning rush hour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The excuse given for its suspension is that poor driving has made it too dangerous, despite TfL research failing to quantify this. Current technology is capable of recording average speeds in the Tunnels; automatic numberplate recognition means that a dedicated police presence could respond to a previous offender re-entering the tunnel approach. We ask for this technology to be implemented immediately, and morning contraflow reinstated.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
